sys_ui_macro.description: Insert process flow tabs based on stage of process Parameters: stage - 1=Payment Details;2=User Statement Selection;3=Review and Confirm;4=Complete Usage: <g:macro_invoke macro="x_89907_vehicle_to_payment_process_flow" id="payment_process_flow" stage="2" />
sys_ui_macro.name: payment_process_flow
sys_ui_macro.xml:
var activeClass = []; var stage = jelly.jvar_stage; stage == 1 ? activeClass.push("active") : activeClass.push("disabled"); stage == 2 ? activeClass.push("active") : activeClass.push("disabled"); stage == 3 ? activeClass.push("active") : activeClass.push("disabled"); activeClass; var completedClass = []; var stage = jelly.jvar_stage; stage > 1 ? completedClass.push("completed") : completedClass.push(""); stage > 2 ? completedClass.push("completed") : completedClass.push(""); stage > 3 ? completedClass.push("completed") : completedClass.push(""); completedClass;
  1. ${gs.getMessage("Payment Details")}
  2. ${gs.getMessage("User Statement Selection")}
  3. ${gs.getMessage("Review and Confirm")}
